=PirSF=

Get the number of Pirsf available:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/pirsf/count]

Get Pirsf by Id (this Id is the internal JBioWH WID that change in all DB):
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/pirsf/736824737]

Get from/to Pirsf by range:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/pirsf/1/3]

Get from/to Pirsf by PirSFNumber:
    [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/pirsf/pirsfnumber/PIRSF038885]

Search Pirsf groups by string using % (Search over the fields: PirSFNumber, name and accession number in this order. Use %25 for the wildcard):

    PirSFNumber ({{{PIRSF03888*}}}):
       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/pirsf/search/PIRSF03888%25]
    Name ({{{cytochrome*}}}):
       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/pirsf/search/cytochrome%25]
    Accession Number (A0A174):
       [http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/pirsf/search/A0A174]
